00003 namespace {
00007   const double explorationthreshold = 5.0;
00008 
00010   const double maxval = 20.0;
00011 
00014   const double discountfactor = 1.0;
00015 
00019   const double epsilon = 0.01;
00020 
00021   StatePredicateRef truep = TrueStatePredicate::create();
00022   StatePredicateRef falsep = FalseStatePredicate::create();
00023   StateFunctionRef upper_bound = ConstantStateFunction::create(maxval);
00024 } // end of anonymous namespace
00025 
00026 TaskRef create_subtask(const std::string &name,
00027                        StatePredicateRef termination,
00028                        const std::vector<TaskRef> &children,
00029                        DynamicAveragerRef state_variables)
00030 {
00031   return CompositeTask::create(name,
00032                                children.begin(),
00033                                children.end(),
00034                                NegationPredicate::create(termination),
00035                                termination,
00036                                upper_bound,
00037                                state_variables,
00038                                discountfactor,
00039                                epsilon);
00040 }
00041 
00042 TaskRef get_task_hierarchy(taskspec_t *ts)
00043 {
00044   // Verify that the environment looks like the Taxi domain.
00045   assert(getNumDoubleObs(ts) == 0);
00046   assert(getNumDoubleAct(ts) == 0);
00047   assert(getNumIntObs(ts) == 4);
00048   assert(getNumIntAct(ts) == 1);
00049   assert(getIntActMin(ts, 0) == 0);
00050   assert(getIntActMax(ts, 0) == 5);
00051 
00052   StateVariables dimensions;
00053 
00054   // Create north, south, east, west
00055   static const char *nsew[] = { "north", "south", "east", "west" };
00056   std::vector<TaskRef> navigation_primitives;
00057   for (unsigned i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
00058     dimensions[i] = 1.0;
00059   DynamicAveragerRef xy_space = ProjectionAverager::create(dimensions);
00060   for (int i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00061     TaskRef primitive = PrimitiveTask::create(nsew[i],
00062                                               i,
00063                                               explorationthreshold,
00064                                               maxval,
00065                                               xy_space,
00066                                               truep);
00067     navigation_primitives.push_back(primitive);
00068   }
00069 
00070   std::vector<TaskRef> navigation_subtasks;
00071 
00072   // Create NAVIGATE(RED)
00073   std::map<unsigned,double> red_landmark;
00074   red_landmark[0] = 4.0;
00075   red_landmark[1] = 0.0;
00076   StatePredicateRef red_landmark_predicate =
00077     GoalStatePredicate::create(red_landmark.begin(), red_landmark.end());
00078   navigation_subtasks.push_back(create_subtask("NAVIGATE(RED)",
00079                                                red_landmark_predicate,
00080                                                navigation_primitives,
00081                                                xy_space));
00082 
00083   // Create NAVIGATE(BLUE)
00084   std::map<unsigned,double> blue_landmark;
00085   blue_landmark[0] = 0.0;
00086   blue_landmark[1] = 3.0;
00087   StatePredicateRef blue_landmark_predicate =
00088     GoalStatePredicate::create(blue_landmark.begin(), blue_landmark.end());
00089   navigation_subtasks.push_back(create_subtask("NAVIGATE(BLUE)",
00090                                                blue_landmark_predicate,
00091                                                navigation_primitives,
00092                                                xy_space));
00093 
00094   // Create NAVIGATE(GREEN)
00095   std::map<unsigned,double> green_landmark;
00096   green_landmark[0] = 4.0;
00097   green_landmark[1] = 4.0;
00098   StatePredicateRef green_landmark_predicate =
00099     GoalStatePredicate::create(green_landmark.begin(), green_landmark.end());
00100   navigation_subtasks.push_back(create_subtask("NAVIGATE(GREEN)",
00101                                                green_landmark_predicate,
00102                                                navigation_primitives,
00103                                                xy_space));
00104 
00105   // Create NAVIGATE(YELLOW)
00106   std::map<unsigned,double> yellow_landmark;
00107   yellow_landmark[0] = 0.0;
00108   yellow_landmark[1] = 0.0;
00109   StatePredicateRef yellow_landmark_predicate =
00110     GoalStatePredicate::create(yellow_landmark.begin(), yellow_landmark.end());
00111   navigation_subtasks.push_back(create_subtask("NAVIGATE(YELLOW)",
00112                                                yellow_landmark_predicate,
00113                                                navigation_primitives,
00114                                                xy_space));
00115 
00116   // Create pickup primitive
00117   dimensions[2] = 1.0;
00118   DynamicAveragerRef xy_pass_space = ProjectionAverager::create(dimensions);
00119   TaskRef pickup_primitive = PrimitiveTask::create("pickup",
00120                                                    4,
00121                                                    explorationthreshold,
00122                                                    maxval,
00123                                                    xy_pass_space,
00124                                                    truep);
00125 
00126   // Create GET subtask
00127   std::map<unsigned,double> passenger_in_taxi_landmark;
00128   passenger_in_taxi_landmark[2] = 4.0;
00129   StatePredicateRef passenger_in_taxi =
00130     GoalStatePredicate::create(passenger_in_taxi_landmark.begin(),
00131                                passenger_in_taxi_landmark.end());
00132   std::vector<TaskRef> children = navigation_subtasks;
00133   children.push_back(pickup_primitive);
00134   TaskRef get_subtask = create_subtask("GET",
00135                                        passenger_in_taxi,
00136                                        children,
00137                                        xy_pass_space);
00138 
00139   // Create putdown primitive
00140   dimensions[3] = 1.0;
00141   DynamicAveragerRef full_space = ProjectionAverager::create(dimensions);
00142   TaskRef putdown_primitive = PrimitiveTask::create("putdown",
00143                                                     5,
00144                                                     explorationthreshold,
00145                                                     maxval,
00146                                                     full_space,
00147                                                     truep);
00148 
00149   // Create PUT subtask
00150   children = navigation_subtasks;
00151   children.push_back(putdown_primitive);
00152   TaskRef put_subtask = create_subtask("PUT",
00153                                        NegationPredicate::create(passenger_in_taxi),
00154                                        children,
00155                                        full_space);
00156 
00157   // Create ROOT task
00158   children.clear();
00159   children.push_back(get_subtask);
00160   children.push_back(put_subtask);
00161   return create_subtask("ROOT", falsep, children, full_space);
00162 }
